column5: Commander Hatfield posted this photo today.
I wonder if I can zoom in and see us out on Simcoe?

Yes there is satellite pics every 12 hrs or so on coast watch that shows Ontario in pretty good detail as long as there isn't thick clouds !!!! Pretty cool that you can get that live from space !!! It also shows thermal temps of the Great Lakes !!!! Been using it for years !!! Someone will post the link I'm sure .... I'm on my iPhone and don't have it here... Thanks for sharing
looking like trolling season will soon be upon us
Very cool but if the water level doesn't come up a few of the launches will stay High & Dry, Lake Huron is a lot lower then last fall Tight Lines SBK
I love watching the ice line "receed" each spring - Helps me get to the opener..
Nipissing sure looks cold... in that photo...!  -20 here overnight..
